channel.title: Problem with server ports
channel.description: ok i got my server running (piepiepie.no-ip.org) but im trying to get to to work on other computer but i cant log on it.. all my other friends can, but im using a router for my connection on both comps so i dunno how to get it to work on other computer. because it will just expect me to log on with 0.0.0.0 because im using same ip address. so when i try log on with 0.0.0.0 on other comp it logs on the server thats like 127.0.0.1 like the guy with green shirt and stuff and bronze pick... how can i make it so on the other comp i can log on with piepiepie.no-ip.org and log in my proper source?

item.title: Problem with server ports
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

You haven’t port forwarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with server ports
